snippet: Two airstrikes on Thursday in southern Yemen killed seven militants, including two top operatives of Al Qaeda, Yemeni officials said.
abstract: Two airstrikes in southern Yemen kill seven militants, including two top operatives of Al Qaeda; there is no immediate word from Washington on whether it was behind the airstrikes.
lead_paragraph: Two airstrikes on Thursday in southern Yemen killed seven militants, including two top operatives of Al Qaeda, Yemeni officials said.

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations
